column.name: SUBSCRIBER_NO
column.comment: Participant number

column.name: BAN
column.comment: Indication of the customer's billing account number. The customer is the (natural or legal) person to whom services are provided on the basis of a contract concluded with D2-Vodafone. For himself or others to him

column.name: FU_SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Time of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: FU_SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: BALANCE_EU
column.comment: The current balance of a prepaid subscriber (in Euro). - Current prepaid balance, gross amount.

column.name: CURRENCY
column.comment: currency

column.name: PREV_BALANCE_AMT_EU
column.comment: The Billing Account's previous balance, i.e. the total amount due from the previous bill. It also can be the previous month's balance of a prepaid subscriber.

column.name: PREV_CURRENCY
column.comment: The currency on which the previous IN balance is specified.

column.name: DIRECT_DEBIT_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether a direct debit subscriber is eligible to replenish by direct debit.

column.name: ACCUMULATED_AMT_EU
column.comment: Contains the accumulated amount in EURO.

column.name: ACCUMULATED_CURRENCY
column.comment: The currency on which the accumulated amount is specified.

column.name: REPLENISH_IND
column.comment: Indicates if replenishment of a prepaid subscriber is allowed.

column.name: FU_INITIAL_CALL_DATE
column.comment: The date on which the prepaid subscriber performed the initiation call.

column.name: POSTCARD_ARRIVED_IND
column.comment: Indicates if the registration postcard from the subscriber has arrived.

column.name: FU_BALANCE_EXPIRATION_DATE
column.comment: The date on which the balance of a prepaid subscriber expires.

column.name: FU_CANCEL_DATE
column.comment: The date on which the invoice was cancelled.

column.name: FIRST_REPLENISHMENT_AMT_EU
column.comment: For CallYa packages and CallYa boxes contains the amount of the starting credit (in euros and cents).

column.name: FIRST_REPLENISHMENT_CURRENCY
column.comment: The currency of the initial replenishment.

column.name: MONTH_LIMIT_REACH_IND
column.comment: Monthly replenishment reached the indicator.

column.name: FU_POSTCARD_ARRIVED_DATE
column.comment: The date when the subscriber's postcard arrived. It is updated automatically when the user sets the Postcard Arrived indicator to "Yes".

column.name: FU_PACKAGE_SALE_DATE
column.comment: The date when the package was sold to the subscriber. Updated by the user when the postcard was sent. The Arrived Indicator is set to :Yes", according to the date written on the postcard.

column.name: FU_PREPAID_IN_BALANCE_DATE
column.comment: The date when the IN balance is updated.

column.name: FU_LAST_DCC_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: The date when the last DCC update occurred.

column.name: RECONCILED_BALANCE_AMT_EU
column.comment: Last reconciled DCC balance, in Euro. Updated by the DCC reconciliation process

column.name: RECONCILED_BALANCE_CURRENCY
column.comment: The currency of the reconciled balance. Updated by the DCC reconciliation process

column.name: BILL_BALANCE_AMT_EU
column.comment: The IN balance used by the last billing cycle in Euro. The billing confirmation process will copy this field to PPD_PREV_IN_BALANCE. It is copied from the IN balance by billing.

column.name: BILL_BALANCE_AMT_CURRENCY
column.comment: The currency of the bill balance. Copied from the IN currency by billing.

column.name: EXPIRATION_DATE_BARR_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the subscriber has been barred in the DCC since the balance expiration date has passed. Valid values: 'Y' - subscriber without a mailbox is barred, 'V' - subscriber with a mailbox is barred, 'N' - subscriber is not barred.

column.name: DEBIT_PROTECTION_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the password for direct debit is active for this subscriber.

column.name: MAINTENANCE_BARRED_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the subscriber was barred for SMS and incoming calls by the maintenance process. Valid values: 'Y' - subscriber is barred, 'N' - subscriber is not barred.

column.name: MATERNA_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether SMS charge includes charge for VAS. Valid values: 'Y' - includes, 'N' - does not include.

column.name: MATERNA_BARRED_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether Dr. Materna service is barred.

column.name: REVERSAL_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the customer had a reversal transaction from the bank. Valid values: 'Y' -reversal transaction received, 'N' - not received

column.name: DELINQUENCY_STATUS
column.comment: Indicates whether the account is considered delinquent.

column.name: FU_DELINQUENCY_AMT_DATE
column.comment: Date of delinquency amount

column.name: PACKAGE_AMT_EU
column.comment: Package amount in Euro (without the voucher). While receiving the postcard this amount will be populated.

column.name: ADD_PACKAGE_TO_TAX_IND
column.comment: Indicates if the package_amt should be added to the tax invoice calculation. Valid values: 'Y' - should be added, 'N' - should not be added.

column.name: MONTH_TOT_POS_CHARGE_EU
column.comment: Total of all current month positive charges in Euro. The amount is zeroed  at by billing, at cycle run, and at inserting the record the first time.

column.name: MONTH_TOT_NEG_CHARGE_EU
column.comment: Total of all current month negative charges in Euro. The amount is zeroed  by billing, at cycle run, and at inserting the record the first time.

column.name: PREV1_TOT_POS_CHARGE_EU
column.comment: Total of all previous month positive charges in Euro. The amount is zeroed at inserting the record first time and copied from MONTH_TOT_POS_CHRG field by billing, at cycle run.

column.name: PREV1_TOT_NEG_CHARGE_EU
column.comment: Total of all previous month negative charges in Euro. The amount is zeroed at inserting the record first time and copied from MONTH_TOT_POS_CHRG field by billing, at cycle run.

column.name: PREV2_TOT_POS_CHARGE_EU
column.comment: Total of all previous month positive charges in Euro. The amount is zeroed at inserting the record first time and copied from PRV_M_TOT_POS_CHRG field by billing, at cycle run.

column.name: PREV2_TOT_NEG_CHARGE_EU
column.comment: Total of all previous month negative charges in Euro. The amount is zeroed at inserting the record first time and copied from PRV_M_TOT_POS_CHRG field by billing, at cycle run.

column.name: FU_LAST_IN_TO_CHG
column.comment: Last Tariff offer

column.name: VT_IND
column.comment: VT indicator

column.name: SECOND_REPLENISHMENT
column.comment: Indicator for second replenishment

column.name: MOBILE_COUPON_NO
column.comment: 15-digit sequence number for matching the porting requests with the mobile phones actually requested.

column.name: RENUNCIATION_FLAG
column.comment: The renunciation flag indicator.

column.name: FU_RENUN_FLAG_DATE
column.comment: The update date of the renunciation flag.

column.name: AR_DCC_NOT_UPDATABLE_IND
column.comment: The euro sum amount of all of the A/R financial activities that didn't update the DCC account but updated the EU_PPD_IN_BALANCE field directly.

column.name: AR_DCC_NOT_UPD_AMT
column.comment: Indicator if the DCC account is no longer connected to the subscriber and should not be updated.

column.name: FU_LAST_FNF_UPDATE
column.comment: Last Tariff update

column.name: OUTPAYMENT_DCC_AMT
column.comment: Outpayment DCC Amount

column.name: NOC_SMS_SENT
column.comment: Indicator if SMS is send from NOC or not.

column.name: FILLER
column.comment: N/A
